oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Desr web service
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Francesco Rubino
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dependency parser
Italian Language
Written language
Syntactic analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Desr is a web service that performs dependency parsing on Italian tokenised, part-of-speech tagged, morphologically analysed texts. The web service was originally deployed by CNR-ILC within the EU-FP7-STREP PANACEA project (www.panacea-lr.eu) and implements the 2007 DeSR Parser [r4] code developed at the University of Pisa by Prof. Attardi and his group, and available at https://sourceforge.net/p/desr/code/HEAD/tree/branches. For details on the tool and code please see http://desr.sourceforge.net and the scientific references therein.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Istituto di Linguistica Computazionale “A. Zampolli” - Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche (ILC-CNR)
